p: All fractions were checked by Thin Layer Chromatography (TLC) on Merck 60 F254 (Billerica, MA, USA) pre-coated silica gel plates (20 Ã— 10 cm). The compounds were eluted by c-Hex (100% v/ v) system. TLC plates were sprayed with a solution of equal volumes of 5% vanillin in methanol and 5% v/v sulfuric acid in methanol and finally revealed by heating.
